CONCLUSION: Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 13;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant was married to ORG They divorced on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted non - contentious civil proceedings against ORG in ORG , ORG ( Temeljno sodišče v PERSON , PERSON ) seeking the division of their common property . To this end she submitted a proposal . Upon the request of the court , the applicant submitted an amendment to her proposal on DATE .
On DATE and DATE the court held a hearing where the parties settled the case in part . For the remainder of the property at issue , the court established that there was a dispute over its ownership .

On DATE the court issued a decision referring the applicant to institute contentious civil proceedings against ORG in order to determine the ownership of the garage ( see below paragraphs CARDINAL through CARDINAL ) . At the same time , the court ordered ORG to institute contentious civil proceedings against the applicant to establish the size of his share in the apartment the parties owned jointly .
On DATE the ORG entered into force with respect to GPE .
On DATE ORG ( ORG sodišče v PERSON ) gained jurisdiction in the present case due to the reform of the NORP judicial system .
At an undetermined time , but after DATE , ORG scheduled a hearing in the non - contentious proceedings for DATE .

On DATE the applicant informed the court that the parties had settled the remainder of the case and withdrew her proposal of CARDINAL DATE . Consequently , the court terminated the proceedings on CARDINAL DATE .
The decision was served on the applicant on DATE and became final on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG instituted contentious proceedings against the applicant in ORG , ORG ( Temeljno sodišče v PERSON , PERSON ) . The applicant did not institute proceedings against ORG of which she informed the court on DATE .
On DATE ORG ( Okrožno sodišče v PERSON ) gained jurisdiction in the present case due to the reform of the NORP judicial system .
On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings against ORG in ORG seeking equal share of their common apartment .
On DATE the applicant requested priority treatment for her case .
On DATE the applicant requested the court to issue an interlocutory measure prohibiting ORG to encumber or give up the apartment .
On DATE , upon the request of ORG , ORG joined both sets of proceedings and issued the interlocutory measure sought by the applicant .
On DATE the applicant again sought priority treatment for her case . On DATE the court informed her that her case did not require a priority treatment .
DATE and DATE the court held CARDINAL hearings . It heard CARDINAL witnesses and both parties .

On DATE the court held a hearing where the parties settled the case in part . The court issued a judgment holding that the applicant owned MONEY of the apartment and ORG the rest . It also ordered ORG to pay rent to the applicant for the time he had been using the apartment . The judgment was served on the applicant on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant appealed to ORG ( PERSON sodišče v PERSON ) . ORG cross - appealed .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the applicant filed a request to speed up the proceedings . On DATE the court informed the applicant that her case was not a matter of priority .

On DATE the court allowed the appeals in part , found that the applicant and ORG owned the apartment in equal shares and remitted the case in the part referring to payment of rent to the first - instance court for re - examination . The judgment was served on the applicant on DATE .
CARDINAL . At an undetermined time , ORG lodged an appeal on points of law with ORG sodišče ) .
On DATE the court dismissed the appeal .
The judgment was served on the applicant on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the parties settled the case in ORG . The proceedings were thus terminated .
